headline.main: Cockroaches: Indestructible, and Instructive to Robot Makers

keywords.value: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The pests could offer a new model for devices that crawl through rubble to look for survivors or gather information after disasters, scientists say.
lead_paragraph: The pests could offer a new model for devices that crawl through rubble to look for survivors or gather information after disasters, scientists say.
